thread.title: Re: Rep. Maxine Waters doesn’t want 4 years of Trump, talks about impeachment
thread.title_full: Re: Rep. Maxine Waters doesn’t want 4 years of Trump, talks about impeachment

author: Lizzyp
title: Re: Rep. Maxine Waters doesn’t want 4 years of Trump, talks about impeachment
text:
Rep. Maxine Waters doesn’t want 4 years of Trump, talks about impeachment Posted at 9:32 pm on February 3, 2017 by William A. 
Representative Maxine Waters did an interview today where she talked about Trump and impeachment: Today, I told @cheddar that my greatest desire was to lead @realDonaldTrump right into impeachment. 
— Maxine Waters (@MaxineWaters) February 3, 2017 
Video: Congresswoman @MaxineWaters , on working with President Trump: "My greatest desire is to lead him right into impeachment." #CheddarLIVE pic.twitter.com/Hr5THHR3XM
